properties.title: ShorelineMonitor Satellite-Derived Shorelines
properties.description: Parquet datas with ShorelineMonitor Satellite-Derived Shorelines

table:columns.name: box_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for the shoreline box within the ShorelineMonitor global box system.

table:columns.name: time
table:columns.description: Observation year of the shoreline, represented as a timestamp.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Satellite-derived shoreline geometry as linestrings, encoded in Well-Known Binary (WKB) format.

table:columns.name: source_file
table:columns.description: Original geojson file name from which the shoreline data was extracted.

table:columns.name: group
table:columns.description: Identifier for multi-linestring segments within the source ShorelineMonitor data.

table:columns.name: bounding_quadkey
table:columns.description: QuadKey for spatial indexing, corresponding to the shoreline segment's bounding quadtile.

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: QuadKey for spatial indexing, corresponding to interpolated point midway along the shoreline segment.

data.title: ShorelineMonitor Satellite-Derived Shorelines
data.description: ShorelineMonitor Parquet dataset with Satellite-Derived Shorelines for this region.
